__e: Forgive me but you're the only Queen I know.
Forgive me, Lord, but I do believe he is your only choice.
Forgive me, but it's a kind of love that you're showing.
Forgive me, I do not know this name.
I'd have knocked my head against the wall to think I caused your illness.
Forgive me. I want to tell you something.
Forgive me, I do not have as much time as I had planned.
Agnes... my apartment- it's been rented.
Oh, forgive me, Your Grace but I too know what it is to love someone and not be able to see and to hear.
Forgive us if we've made any mistakes.
Forgive us, my Lord, we didn't know what else to do.
Forgive us, we're still learning to speak with you.
Forgive him. I ask you this as your servant.
Go to him and forgive him.
Forgive him, for he was an old man.
